scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains several letter to John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky; receipts for subscriptions and services; and bills for legal services. Four letters from business associates ask to renew notes falling due to Hunt, and letters from Jamison Samuel of St. Louis, Missouri, offer to mortgage his properties or sell them outright to Hunt for a loan. Other letters ask for Philadelphia and New York notes, dicuss debt collection and the exchange rate, and contain funds. A letter from Hunt's daughter, Theodosia Strothers, gives details of her trip to Maryland (November 11, 1838).
